statements: DELETE FROM light_intensity_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND intensity > 50.0
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 10 AND building_id = 5;
DELETE FROM efficiency_plan WHERE efficiency_rating < 0.8 AND last_updated < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM LightIntensityData WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND intensity > 50.0;
DELETE FROM BuildingInformation WHERE building_id IN (SELECT building_id FROM EfficiencyPlan WHERE target_intensity < 30.0);
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE building_id = 54321 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
